Employer collaboration in developing graduate employability: a pilot study in Ireland

Key: oregan_employer_2023

Author(s): O’Regan, Miriam and Carthy, Aiden and McGuinness, Colm and Owende, Philip

Year: 2023

Abstract: Purpose – The purpose of this paper is to evaluate the impact on student work readiness outcomes of collaboration with employers in developing and delivering tailored graduate employability workshops in socioemotional skills for work (SES4Work).
